notes: USCIS Immigration Data Hub with H-2A (temporary agricultural worker) visa petitions/approvals by fiscal year/quarter. Early signal for US harvest labor risk.
USCIS Immigration Data Hub with H-2B (temporary non-agricultural seasonal worker) visa petitions and approvals.

Department of Labor Office of Foreign Labor Certification (OFLC) Performance Data portal. Contains granular employer-level H-2A disclosure data including worksite state/county, # requested vs. certified.
DOL OFLC H-2B disclosure data including state & employer job requests. Leading signal for seasonal labor stress in food processing, hospitality, ports.
USDA ERS reports on farm labor, wages, and H-2A usage. Narrative signals for cross-validation and horizon scanning.
